mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Zbusiness ( zid, zorg, zemail, xmadd, xphone, xpadd, xfax, xcontact, xcity, xemail, xsignatory, xcur, xstate, xzip, xdformat, xdsep, xurl, xtin, xcountry, xvatregno, xcustom, xtimage, xbimage, central, branch, centralzid, zauserid, zuuserid, zaip, zuip, zactive, ztime, zutime ) VALUES ( #{zid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zorg, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zemail, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xmadd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xphone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xpadd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xfax, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xcontact, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xcity, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xemail, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xsignatory, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xcur, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xstate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xzip, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xdformat, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xdsep, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xurl, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xtin, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xcountry, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xvatregno, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xcustom, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xtimage, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xbimage, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{central, jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{branch, jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{centralzid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zauserid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zuuserid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zaip, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zuip, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zactive, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ztime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{zutime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: UPDATE Zbusiness SET zorg=#{zorg, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zemail=#{zemail, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xmadd=#{xmadd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xphone=#{xphone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xpadd=#{xpadd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xfax=#{xfax, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xcontact=#{xcontact, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xcity=#{xcity, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xemail=#{xemail, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xsignatory=#{xsignatory, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xcur=#{xcur, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xstate=#{xstate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xzip=#{xzip, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xdformat=#{xdformat, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xdsep=#{xdsep, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xurl=#{xurl, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xtin=#{xtin, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xcountry=#{xcountry, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xvatregno=#{xvatregno, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xcustom=#{xcustom, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xtimage=#{xtimage, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xbimage=#{xbimage, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, central=#{central, jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, branch=#{branch, jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, centralzid=#{centralzid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zauserid=#{zauserid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zuuserid=#{zuuserid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zaip=#{zaip, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zuip=#{zuip, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zactive=#{zactive, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ztime=#{ztime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, zutime=#{zutime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} WHERE zid=#{zid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Zbusiness WHERE zid=#{zid} AND zactive='1'
SELECT * FROM Zbusiness WHERE centralzid=#{zid} AND branch='1' AND zactive='1'
SELECT * FROM Zbusiness WHERE zid=#{centralzid} AND central='1' AND zactive='1'
